Text: Hi , thx for your torrent . Could you write a description to them ?

I believe its Black Bible

just a different translation

Anyone who downloaded this that can confirm what it is? its 10 GB!
worth downloading?

Testament of Death is a "adventure type visual novel", ADV for short, made by a company called 3rdEye. Information: http://www.getchu.com/soft.phtml?id=716195
If it'll give you a forbidden page copy and paste the url. :)

If it's worth to download I do not know but you need to know Japanese to play it properly unless you want to use Chiitrans2 or something similar. But try it out, it may very well be the best game you've ever played. ;)
This is most certainly NOT bible black.
btw deathmarine I noticed you upped kurovadis, any chance you will upload Eroico which just released a full version as well?
